source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_00<tab>A shattered antique vase will not deter Inspector Hildibrand from his mission.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_00<tab>事件屋ヒルディブランドは、壺の修理ができる彫金師について心当たりがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_01<tab>According to Inspector Hildibrand, the vase could be reconstructed with the aid of a certain master goldsmith─a man as fearsome as he is skilled, capable of wielding his hammer as both a tool of creation and destruction. The goldsmith is like to be found in Bluefog, where he often goes to gather his materials. With the aid of your comrades─including the newly recruited Gilgamesh and his loyal companion, Enkidu─begin your search there.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_01<tab>ヒルディブランドによると、「白髪鬼」と恐れられる彫金師なら、バラバラになった壺を修理することができるらしい。白髪鬼と呼ばれる彫金師は、北ザナラーンで素材集めをしているという。北ザナラーンに向かい、「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」の北で彫金師の痕跡を探そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_02<tab>You find Nashu poking a dead doblyn, which was likely slain by the goldsmith given its wounds. A trail of bloody footprints leads to the north...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E92D001 /var>を調べた。北に向かって血痕が続いているようだ。引き続き、「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」の北で彫金師の痕跡を探そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_03<tab>The trail leads you to a dead basilisk, which Gilgamesh observes was slain with a single blow to the head. Fresh tracks lead to the north─and gods only know what else.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E92D101 /var>を調べた。さらに北に向かって血痕が続いているようだ。引き続き、「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」の北で彫金師の痕跡を探そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_04<tab>At the end of the trail, you find a dead ahriman and chimera, but naught else, leading Inspector Hildibrand to conclude that the goldsmith is nearby, possibly concealing himself until the party makes its intentions known. Though it pains him greatly, the inspector proclaims that he must perform the dance of House Manderville in order to declare your peaceful intent, and begins to do so at once. Alas, a sudden injury renders him unable to continue, and, left with no other option, he bequeaths knowledge of the dance to you.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E92D201 /var>を調べた。ヒルディブランドによると、付近にあるキマイラの死体近くに、白髪鬼が潜んでいるという。しかし、白髪鬼を呼び寄せるためには、「紳士の舞」を踊る必要があるらしい……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_TODO_00<tab>Search for the goldsmith in northern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグ北で彫金師の痕跡を探す
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_TODO_01<tab>引き続き彫金師の痕跡を探す
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_TODO_02<tab>さらに彫金師の痕跡を探す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>There is but one person in all Eorzea capable of reconstructing this vase. A man whose skill with the hammer has brought rival goldsmiths low, so breathtaking are his works, so fearsome his competitive spirit.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_000バラバラになった壺を直すことができる彫金師……
それは「エオルゼア最強の彫金師」のみ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_001<tab>(-Flamboyant Oaf-)This man is no mere goldsmith. You speak of him as one would of a great warrior.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_001(-東方風の男-)最強……。
そいつは、強いのか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>...Once, a notorious gang of thieves perpetrated a series of robberies in Ul'dah, targeting establishments which sold luxury goods. One such shop was owned by the humble lapidary of whom I speak.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_002……かつて、多くの宝飾品を盗んだ大規模な盗賊団が、
一晩のうちに壊滅する、という事件がありました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_003<tab>His was the last shop the thieves struck, for the following morning they were found beaten, bound, and gagged in the Gold Court.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_003誰が壊滅させたのかは不明。
しかし、倒れた盗賊団の武器にはすべて……
「美しい彫金細工」が施されていたといいます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>The Brass Blades never learned who was responsible. The only information they had was the testimony of a thief, who kept muttering the words, “The hammer... The hammer...”
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_004倒れていた盗賊団の一人は、
現場に駆けつけた銅刃団員に、こう告げました。
「あれは、白髪の鬼だ」と……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_005<tab>(-Flamboyant Oaf-)Aye, that he does! And I do so enjoy the company of dangerous men...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_005(-東方風の男-)…………よし、オレもついていこう！
壺を割っちまった責任もあるし、
その「最強」っていう彫金師にも会ってみてぇからな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_006<tab>But where are my manners? I have yet to properly introduce myself. I am Gilgamesh, and that is my companion, Enkidu!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_006オレは旅の剣豪……その名も、ギルガメッシュ！
改めて、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_007<tab>...Well, not really. It has been many moons since last I saw her, so to ease the burden of loneliness, I tamed a rooster and painted it green.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_007そんで、こいつはオレの相棒、エンキドゥだ！
……ひとり旅が、ちょいと寂しかったもんでな。
ふん捕まえた鶏を染めて、昔の仲間の名前をつけたんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_008<tab>In any case, you mean to search for this goldsmith, yes? If so, it would be my pleasure to help.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_008ここら辺には、オレの宿敵もいねぇようだし……
武器が見つかるまでは暇な身だ。
よろしく頼むぜ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_009<tab>The pleasure is all mine, Gilligan! I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, bid you welcome!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_009私の名前は、事件屋ヒルディブランド。
よろしくお願いしますぞ、ギルンキドゥ殿！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_010<tab>...If it is that hard for you to remember, I give you leave to call me Gil.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_010……色々混ざってるな。
まぁ、覚えられなかったら、ギルちゃんでいいぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_011<tab>Excellent suggestion, Greg! Playful monikers are an effective means of building camaraderie. Call me Hildy!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_011ギルちゃん……素敵な響きですな。
それなら私のことは、ヒルちゃんとお呼びください！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_012<tab>Now then, from what I know of the goldsmith's propensity to procure his materials himself, I have deduced that he is most like to be found in the vicinity of Bluefog in northern Thanalan. It is there we shall begin our search!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_012さて、件の彫金師……白髪鬼ならおそらく、
「ブルーフォグ」付近で魔物を倒し、素材を集めているはず。
我々も行ってみましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_015<tab>What manner of solution could he have? The vase looks to be beyond all hope to me.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_015<tab>なんだか、悪いことしちまったなぁ……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The doblyn's wounds indicate that it was felled with a hammer. A trail of bloody footprints leads to the north...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_020彫金ハンマーが刺さっている……。
魔物の血痕は、北に向かって続いているようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_021<tab>(-Nashu Mhakaracca-)I don't think it's been dead long. Maybe whoever did it is still around?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_021(-ナシュ・マカラッカ-)まだ、血痕が乾いていません～。
死んでから、それほど時間が経っていなさそうですね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_030<tab>If a doblyn became a zombie, would that make it a zomblyn...or a dombie?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_030ドブランさんの顔って、可愛いですねぇ～。
フフフ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The basilisk's wounds indicate that it was felled with a hammer. A trail of bloody footprints leads to the north...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_040彫金ハンマーが刺さっている……。
魔物の血痕は、さらに北に向かって続いているようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_041<tab>(-Gilgamesh-)A single blow to the head. Impressive.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_041(-ギルガメッシュ-)脳天を一撃……か。
こいつぁ、なかなかの手だれだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_050<tab>This goldsmith is not to be trifled with.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_050<tab>ふん……確かに、やべぇ気配がするな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_055<tab>His handiwork is unmistakable. Hmmm... The corpse is still quite warm.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_055まだ、温かいですな……。
……そして、この彫金ハンマー。
間違いありません、白髪鬼は近いですぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_059<tab>The doblyn, the basilisk, this ahriman─all were slain with a hammer. As was that beast over yonder, unless I am mistaken.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_059ドブラン、バジリスク、そしてアーリマン……。
しかし、白髪鬼の獲物は、こんなものではありません。
……おそらく、今回の獲物はあちらでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_060<tab>That chimera must be his latest prize, which means he must still be about.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_060向こうにキマイラの死骸が見えます。
あの近くに、「白髪鬼」がいるはずです……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_061<tab>Mayhap he is watching us at this very moment, attempting to ascertain our intentions. He was ever a cautious man when on the hunt...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_061しかし、我々の追跡を警戒しているのでしょう。
姿を隠してしまったようですな……。
……やはり、あの封印を解かねばなりませんか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_062<tab>Alas, it comes to this! Though every fiber of my being cries out in rebellion, I must break my oath and do the unspeakable!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_062……白髪鬼をおびき寄せる手が、ひとつだけあります。
我が家伝統の秘技、アレを使えばきっと……！
できれば使いたくなかった……でも、マリア殿のため！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_063<tab>Wh-What must you do that is so terrible?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_063ヒルちゃん家の、伝統の秘技……。
い、いったい、どんなあぶねぇ技なんだ……？

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_065I'm a Mander-Mander-Manderville man,♪
Doing what only a Manderville can,♪
From the peaks of Coerthas to Thanalan,♪
Mander-Mander-Manderville man...♪
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_065ズンズンズンズン♪
し・ん・し、それ、し・ん・し！！
ドコドコドコドコド～ン！　ドコドコドコドコド～ン！
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_GILGAMESH_000_066<tab>な、なんて……なんて珍妙な舞だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_067<tab>That... <pant> <pant> That is the dance of House Manderville, passed down from father to son.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_067ハァ……ハァ……これが我が家伝統の秘技……
「紳士の舞」ですぞっ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_068<tab>Were I to perform it within sight of our quarry, he would not be able to resist revealing himself.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_068白髪鬼は、この踊りを知っているはずです……。
これを見たら、必ず現れるでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_069<tab>Alas, I─<gasp>─I neglected to properly stretch my legs beforehand. My good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, I see no other solution; <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> must dance in my stead! Though it be a gross─nay, <var 1A 02 /var>unconscionable<var 1A 01 /var>─violation of my family's traditions, I must bequeath to you the Manderville!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_HILDIBRAND_000_069しかし……アイタターッ、足をくじいてしまいました！
この舞は、冒険者殿……あなたに託しましたぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>You have learned the emote <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Manderville Dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB202_01316_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>エモートアクション「紳士の舞」を覚えた！
